contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 13, 2013 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section A)
Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section A) 20 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-section-a
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Music judge: Mike Kilroy. Entertainment judge: Simon Jones.
Best Soloist: Jenny Howes, Witney Best Presentation/Entertainment: Witney
Best Soprano of the Day (W. Ching Cup): Bridget Owen, Bletchington Best Horn of the Day (Sid Alder Cup): Nikki Jones, Wantage B Best Percussion of the Day (Des Webb Trophy): Daniel Andrews, Harlow [Section B] Best Conductor of the Day (Ron Sudworth Memorial Cup): Danny Dullforce, Wantage B
President's Award: Lynne Bromley Long Service Awards: Les Taylor, Frank Wolff, Ken Membury, Doug White, Richard Cox
Sept. 10, 2013, 9:55 p.m. Oct. 17, 2013, 3:06 p.m.
1 Wantage Concert Brass Danny Dullforce
2 Witney Town Band Rhys Owens
3 Bletchington Silver Band Sheldon Barwick
